titleInfo.title: Second Army on Maneuvers, Cumberland University

subject.geographic: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).

mods.note: This brochure appears to be a mailing sent to prospective students. It highlights Cumberland University`s participation in the training of U.S. army forces during World War II. It also has photos of the training maneuvers and the university.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
